alert.note: Alert for Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 25 at 1:50PM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the second Winter Storm Warning, periods of heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Missouri Headwaters and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the second Winter Storm Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
